title: MSI Pro MP161 E2 Portable Monitor, 15.6" FHD IPS 1080p, USB Type-C, Mini-HDMI, Built-in Speakers, Perfect for PC, Mac, PS5, PS4, Xbox, Mobile, Metal Gray
description: The MSI PRO MP161 E2 portable monitor features a sharp 15.6"" Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS panel with eye-friendly technology and an ergonomic fold-out kickstand that supports both horizontal and vertical display orientations. Designed to improve work productivity for anyone on the go, the monitor features a 60Hz refresh rate (4ms GtG response time) and multiple eye-friendly features, including TÜV Rheinland Eye Comfort certified Less Blue Light and anti-flicker technology, as well as anti-glare screen finishing to reduce eye strain. Additional quality features include a 0° ~ 180° lengthened fold-out kickstand designed to support both portrait or landscape formats, 1/4-inch tripod mount support, dual built-in 1.5W speakers for conference calls, L-shaped cable plugs for secure wired connections, and Display Kit App support for advanced colour & display settings. Connectivity options include mini-HDMI 2.0b and dual USB Type-C ports for versatile device support. Compatible with PC, Mac, laptop, and mobile devices.
